movie.title: Immoral Love
movie.description_intro: The original comedy, set in the world of independent Italian cinema, features a director, frustrated and a fool, who is behind the mirage of making the film of his life to avoid taking responsibility both as a professional and as a man. In fact, the failed thirty nine year old still lives with his mother, attends every evening one or more different women bringing them home, steals the money from his father's pension and continuously asks "on loan" to friends and sister money that has no intention to return . He opened an acting school promising everyone a role in his next film, aware that he probably will not realize it at all, with the only real intent to beat cash and receive the sexual favors of female students. Yet, despite being a squalid, abusive and inept person who does nothing concrete to try to realize his goal, he sees the artistic potential of one of his talented student and begins to fantasize great. And the dream forcefully pushes.

He opened an acting school promising everyone a role in his next film, aware that he probably will not realize it at all, with the only real intent to beat cash and receive the sexual favors of female students. Yet, despite being a squalid, abusive and inept person who does nothing concrete to try to realize his goal, he sees the artistic potential of one of his talented student and begins to fantasize great. And the dream forcefully pushes.

movies.title: Poms
movies.summary: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'
movies.description_full: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'
movies.synopsis: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'

movies.title: Waiting for Forever
movies.summary: Since his parents died in a train crash, Will Donner refused to grow up and became an unemployed drifter, aimless except for one obsession: his undeclared love for neighborhood girl Emma Twist, whom he stalked at a distance throughout the country. When she, now an actress, returns to their home town for her terminally ill, grossly cynical father, Will stays with his unsympathetic, conventional brother Jim, whose wife and kid adore the free-spirited silly uncle, whom neighboring friend Joe and his family cheerfully put up. Now it's time to face Emma.

movies.title: The Fundamentals of Caring
movies.summary: A writer (Paul Rudd) retires after a personal tragedy and becomes a disabled teen's caregiver. When the two embark on an impromptu road trip, their ability to cope is tested as they start to understand the importance of hope and friendship.

movies.title: Don't Think Twice
movies.summary: Jack (Keegan Michael Key) and his girlfriend Samantha (Gillian Jacobs) are a perfect couple who are also Teammates on a popular improv group that perform at a struggling comedy spot in NYC. Together, the team has a family like bond but individually they have their personal dreams of being on the weekly television show "This Weekend Live".
